wikitext.*:
'''William Elvin''' is a Scottish opera singer (bass-baritone) born in Turrif in [[1945]]. He trained at the Royal Academy of Music and sang as a soloist with Scottish Opera and frequently appeared in the productions of the Royal Opera. He sang the first eight songs of ''[[The Road Goes Ever On (book)|The Road Goes Ever On]]'', accompanied by [[Donald Swann]] on piano.
